General.Name: Guangzhou Lushan New Materials Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Guangzhou Lushan New Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells functional polymer materials worldwide. The company offers functional polyolefin adhesive materials, solar cell encapsulation films, functional hot melt adhesive films, macromolecular compatibilizers, and thermoplastic optics, as well as transparent films, degradable/water-soluble materials, medical materials, etc. Its products are used in energy pipelines, solar energy, photoelectric touch screens, furniture/building materials, packaging, military, medical, and other fields. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Bldg 1, Bldg 2, Bldg 3, Bldg 4, Guangzhou, China
